mapper.select: select pname, jibunaddress, doroaddress, weekdayopen, weekdayclose, saturdayopen, saturdayclose, holidayopen, holidayclose, price, replycnt from tbl_parking order by bno desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_parking (bno, pname, lat, plong, jibunaddress, doroaddress, weekdayopen, weekdayclose, saturdayopen, saturdayclose, holidayopen, holidayclose, price) values (seq_parking_bno.nextval, #{pname}, #{lat}, #{plong}, #{jibunaddress}, #{doroaddress}, #{weekdayopen}, #{weekdayclose}, #{saturdayopen}, #{saturdayclose}, #{holidayopen}, #{holidayclose}, #{price})
